Layer.OnCommand: %function (self) char_scold=self; self:zoom(0); self:zoomx(3); self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,4,0) end

Layer.children:
<00Layer Type="ActorFrame" OnCommand="zoom,2.5;spin;effectmagnitude,0,0,90;">
			
		 </00Layer>
		
		<00Layer Type="ActorFrame" OnCommand="zoom,2.5;spin;effectmagnitude,0,0,-60;">
			
		 </00Layer>
		
		<00Layer Type="ActorFrame" OnCommand="zoom,2.5;spin;effectmagnitude,0,0,40;">
			
		 </00Layer>
		
		
		
		<0Layer Type="ActorFrame" CastCommand="%function(self) self:playcommand('Inner'); chara_drand = math.random(0,360);
		chara_dspd = (math.random(0,600)/100)-3; self:playcommand('Turn') end"
		TurnCommand="rotationz,chara_drand;
		linear,0.1;rotationz,chara_drand+(60*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.1;rotationz,chara_drand+(110*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.1;rotationz,chara_drand+(150*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.1;rotationz,chara_drand+(180*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(200*chara_dspd);
		linear,1.0;rotationz,chara_drand+(350*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(370*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(400*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(440*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(490*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(550*chara_dspd);"
		>
		
		 </0Layer>
		<0Layer Type="ActorFrame" CastCommand="%function(self) self:playcommand('Inner'); chara_drand = math.random(0,360);
		chara_dspd = (math.random(0,600)/100)-3; self:playcommand('Turn') end"
		TurnCommand="rotationz,chara_drand;
		linear,0.1;rotationz,chara_drand+(60*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.1;rotationz,chara_drand+(110*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.1;rotationz,chara_drand+(150*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.1;rotationz,chara_drand+(180*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(200*chara_dspd);
		linear,1.0;rotationz,chara_drand+(350*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(370*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(400*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(440*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(490*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(550*chara_dspd);"
		>
		
		 </0Layer>
		<0Layer Type="ActorFrame" CastCommand="%function(self) self:playcommand('Inner'); chara_drand = math.random(0,360);
		chara_dspd = (math.random(0,600)/100)-3; self:playcommand('Turn') end"
		TurnCommand="rotationz,chara_drand;
		linear,0.1;rotationz,chara_drand+(60*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.1;rotationz,chara_drand+(110*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.1;rotationz,chara_drand+(150*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.1;rotationz,chara_drand+(180*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(200*chara_dspd);
		linear,1.0;rotationz,chara_drand+(350*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(370*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(400*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(440*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(490*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(550*chara_dspd);"
		>
		
		 </0Layer>
		<0Layer Type="ActorFrame" CastCommand="%function(self) self:playcommand('Inner'); chara_drand = math.random(0,360);
		chara_dspd = (math.random(0,600)/100)-3; self:playcommand('Turn') end"
		TurnCommand="rotationz,chara_drand;
		linear,0.1;rotationz,chara_drand+(60*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.1;rotationz,chara_drand+(110*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.1;rotationz,chara_drand+(150*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.1;rotationz,chara_drand+(180*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(200*chara_dspd);
		linear,1.0;rotationz,chara_drand+(350*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(370*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(400*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(440*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(490*chara_dspd);
		linear,0.2;rotationz,chara_drand+(550*chara_dspd);"
		>
		
		 </0Layer>
		
		<0Layer Type="ActorFrame"
		InitCommand="%function(self)
			
			gf2_binary = {}
			function gf2_add_number(obj)
				obj:GetChild(''):diffuse(0,1,0,1)
				obj:GetChild(''):setstate(math.random(0,3))
				table.insert(gf2_binary,obj)
			end
			
		end"
		CastCommand="%function(self)
			
			for i=1,table.getn(gf2_binary) do
				local a = gf2_binary[i]
				if a then
					local zm = math.random(500,900)/1000
					local slp = math.random(0,600)/1000
					a:finishtweening()
					a:hidden(0)
					a:basezoomx(zm)
					a:basezoomy(zm)
					a:GetChild(''):diffuse(0,1,0,0.7)
					a:GetChild(''):glowshift()
					a:GetChild(''):effectcolor2(1,1,1,1)
					a:GetChild(''):effectcolor1(1,1,1,0)
					a:GetChild(''):effectperiod(0.1)
					a:GetChild(''):effectdelay(math.random(800,1600)/2000)
					a:xy(math.random(-40,40),math.random(-60,60))
					a:sleep(slp)
					a:tween(1,'outQuad(%f, 0, 1, 1)')
					local ang = math.atan2(a:GetY(),a:GetX())
					local dist = math.random(60,200)
					a:addx( dist*math.cos(ang) )
					a:addy( dist*math.sin(ang) )
					a:GetChild(''):zoomx(2)
					a:GetChild(''):zoomy(0)
					a:GetChild(''):sleep(slp)
					a:GetChild(''):bounceend(0.2)
					a:GetChild(''):zoom(1)
					a:GetChild(''):sleep(0.5)
					a:GetChild(''):linear(0.5)
					a:GetChild(''):diffuse(0,1,0,0)
					a:sleep(.5)
					a:queuecommand('Hide')
				end
			end
			
		end"
		>
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
			
			 
		</0Layer>
